00025 //  Templated sparse vector (Fortran conventions).
00026 //  Used primarily to interface with Fortran sparse matrix libaries.
00027 //  (CANNOT BE USED AS AN STL CONTAINER.)
00028 
00029 #ifndef FSPVEC_H
00030 #define FSPVEC_H
00031 
00032 #include "tnt/tnt.h"
00033 #include "tnt/vec.h"
00034 #include <cstdlib>
00035 #include <cassert>
00036 #include <iostream>
00037 #include <strstream>
00038 
00039 using namespace std;
00040 
00041 namespace TNT
00042 {
00043 
00044 template <class T>
00045 class Fortran_Sparse_Vector 
00046 {
00047 
00048 
00049   public:
00050 
00051     typedef Subscript   size_type;
00052     typedef         T   value_type;
00053     typedef         T   element_type;
00054     typedef         T*  pointer;
00055     typedef         T*  iterator;
00056     typedef         T&  reference;
00057     typedef const   T*  const_iterator;
00058     typedef const   T&  const_reference;
00059 
00060     Subscript lbound() const { return 1;}
00061  
00062   protected:
00063     Vector<T>   val_;
00064     Vector<Subscript> index_;
00065     Subscript dim_;                  // prescribed dimension
00066 
00067 
00068   public:
00069 
00070     // size and shape information
00071 
00072     Subscript dim() const { return dim_; }
00073     Subscript num_nonzeros() const { return val_.dim(); }
00074 
00075     // access
00076 
00077     T& val(Subscript i) { return val_(i); }
00078     const T& val(Subscript i) const { return val_(i); }
00079 
00080     Subscript &index(Subscript i) { return index_(i); }
00081     const Subscript &index(Subscript i) const { return index_(i); }
00082 
00083     // constructors
00084 
00085     Fortran_Sparse_Vector() : val_(), index_(), dim_(0)  {};
00086     Fortran_Sparse_Vector(Subscript N, Subscript nz) : val_(nz), 
00087             index_(nz), dim_(N)  {};
00088     Fortran_Sparse_Vector(Subscript N, Subscript nz, const T *values,
00089         const Subscript *indices): val_(nz, values), index_(nz, indices),
00090             dim_(N) {}
00091 
00092     Fortran_Sparse_Vector(const Fortran_Sparse_Vector<T> &S): 
00093         val_(S.val_), index_(S.index_), dim_(S.dim_) {}
00094 
00095     // initialize from string, e.g.
00096     //
00097     //  Fortran_Sparse_Vector<T> A(N, 2, "1.0 2.1", "1 3");
00098     //
00099     Fortran_Sparse_Vector(Subscript N, Subscript nz, char *v,
00100         char *ind) : val_(nz, v), index_(nz, ind), dim_(N) {}
00101     
00102     // assignments
00103 
00104     Fortran_Sparse_Vector<T> & newsize(Subscript N, Subscript nz)
00105     {
00106         val_.newsize(nz);
00107         index_.newsize(nz);
00108         dim_ = N;
00109         return *this;
00110     }
00111 
00112     Fortran_Sparse_Vector<T> & operator=( const Fortran_Sparse_Vector<T> &A)
00113     {
00114         val_ = A.val_;
00115         index_ = A.index_;
00116         dim_ = A.dim_;
00117 
00118         return *this;
00119     }
00120 
00121     // methods
00122 
00123 
00124 
00125 };
00126 
00127 
00128 /* ***************************  I/O  ********************************/
00129 
00130 template <class T>
00131 ostream& operator<<(ostream &s, const Fortran_Sparse_Vector<T> &A)
00132 {
00133     // output format is :   N nz val1 ind1 val2 ind2 ... 
00134     Subscript nz=A.num_nonzeros();
00135 
00136     s <<  A.dim() << " " << nz << endl;
00137 
00138     for (Subscript i=1; i<=nz; i++)
00139         s   << A.val(i) << "  " << A.index(i) << endl;
00140     s << endl;
00141 
00142     return s;
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 template <class T>
00147 istream& operator>>(istream &s, Fortran_Sparse_Vector<T> &A)
00148 {
00149     // output format is :   N nz val1 ind1 val2 ind2 ... 
00150 
00151     Subscript N;
00152     Subscript nz;
00153 
00154     s >> N >> nz;
00155 
00156     A.newsize(N, nz);
00157 
00158     for (Subscript i=1; i<=nz; i++)
00159             s >>  A.val(i) >> A.index(i);
00160 
00161 
00162     return s;
00163 }
00164 
00165 } // namespace TNT
00166 
00167 #endif
00168 // FSPVEC_H
